industry: Pharmaceutical Manufacturing and Warehousing and Storage
description:
HealthPlus Staffing is seeking experienced Warehouse Managers with a background in manufacturing for one of our preferred clients in Fort Lauderdale, FL. The ideal candidate is bilingual in English and Spanish and has strong leadership skills.

Key Responsibilities

  • Oversee daily warehouse operations and ensure efficiency.
  • Manage inventory, shipping, and receiving processes.
  • Supervise and train warehouse staff.
  • Implement and maintain safety procedures and protocols.
  • Coordinate with other departments to streamline operations.

Qualifications

  • Proven experience as a Warehouse Manager in a manufacturing setting.
  • Bilingual in English and Spanish.
  • Strong organizational and leadership skills.
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.

How to Apply: If you meet the qualifications and are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume for consideration.

HealthPlus Staffing is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
